metadata.synopsis: Dialog by one of the guards in the Undercellar Entrance.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Triggered by the primary checkpoint trigger.Guard position: -1694; 12; 573Trigger position: -1692; 17; 574

1.speaker: Sparks Musgravel, Tusgront
1.text: You can pass, but watch yourself. We're all a little jumpy these days.

2.speaker: Sparks Musgravel, Tusgront
2.text: You've taken a wrong turn, friend.

0.speaker: Sparks Musgravel, Tusgront
0.text: You'll find things much safer back the way you came. Trust me.
